Paragraph.Text: Organic Solar Panels are a low maintenance source of renewable power. They must be placed with direct access to the sky above them and will generate power during the day and at a reduced rate during the night. They will distribute this power to any adjacent machine, Power Storage Block or Laser Power Transmitter.
Organic Solar Panels have decent internal power capacity but should still be backed up by a suitable number of Power Storage Blocks to ensure a reliable supply of power at all times.
